name: Joyo Kanji Quiz
detailed_description:
A quiz that helps you review all Japanese characters that kids must learn when they go to school. From 1st grade all the way to secondary school, you can learn all 2,136 Kanji, their meanings and pronunciations.

Features

  • All questions have a timer set between 2 and 20 seconds.
  • Choose how many questions per quiz. From 3 to 30.
  • The following levels are available: grades 1 to 6, Secondary school level or any Kanji from the Joyo list.
  • You can also review both the Hiragana and Katakana scripts.
  • 3 ways to take a quiz: guess a Kanji's meaning or its pronunciations; Also you can have a word in English and then choose the matching Kanji.

Achievements available to highlight your progress!
